channel.title: Gandalf > Dumbledore
channel.description:
Any day of the week!
Gandalf defeated a Balrog and Dumbledore well he died.....
Discuss

item.title: Gandalf > Dumbledore
item.dc:creator: @Loveandpower Loveandpower
item.description:
@Loveandpower wrote:

[quote=“Davidi2, post:70, topic:407974”][quote author=ytuio9 link=topic=509259.msg3700464#msg3700464 date=1312723373]

[quote author=Davidi2 link=topic=509259.msg3699249#msg3699249 date=1312646593]

[quote author=Moparisthebest link=topic=509259.msg3699159#msg3699159 date=1312635029]

Yea, and we already discussed that. He didn’t even technically beat it, as he had to be ‘regenerated’ by the ‘Gods’ of LOTR. The books also said that the power of that creature (balrog) was rivaled by that of dragons, which Dumbledore can easily defeat.

He beat it, and afterwards ‘came back’, not during.
[/quote]http://tolkien.cro.net/else/gdfdie.html

I think you guys are taking too much from the movies, where it’s their job to add suspense to it XD
[/quote]and that Gollum and Dobby were the same actors too lol
[/quote]I lol’d[/quote]MY PRECIOUS!

No…MASTER ITS MY PRECIOUS!

[size=12pt]MY PRECIOUS!!![/size]

on topic: Think about it like this as well…in the harry potter games you never get to fight as dumbledore while you can fight as gandalf. Gandalf had limited resources of storage for magic.

Read full topic

item.title: Gandalf > Dumbledore
item.dc:creator: @Immortal_Technique Immortal Technique
item.description:
@Immortal_Technique wrote:

[quote=“Davidi2, post:66, topic:407974”][quote author=bballin24 link=topic=509259.msg3700038#msg3700038 date=1312685851]

When has Gandalf shown any real battle prowess? He’s a great diplomat and I’d definitely prefer him leading my army, but Dumbledore could kill him from 300 feet away before Gandalf could do anything

Gandalf does fight in the second movie he brings an army with him against the orcs, cant remember exactly when but he rides on the hill and shines his staff and they all are like ahhhhh and he wins. Sorry cant remember exact battle name It was the one where the orcs are against Aaragons dad? Gandalf also says his famous line “A wizard is never late or early he is precisely on time” Something to that effect
[/quote]Again, you’re basing it all on the movies…

[quote author=Immortal Technique link=topic=509259.msg3700054#msg3700054 date=1312687617]

Aren’t Gandalf and Dumbledore the same people?

thats like saying harry potter and lord of the rings are the same story oh wait u basicly said that

meant person*
[/quote]No, they aren’t the same[/quote]
there not the same actor?

Read full topic
